channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2/10: CBS Morning News
item.description: President Trump to impose 25% tariffs on steel and aluminum imports; Taylor Swift reacts to getting booed at the 2025 Super Bowl.

item.title: Trump says he is serious about Canada becoming 51st state in Super Bowl interview

item.title: Trump says he will impose a 25% tariff on aluminum and steel imports
item.description: A tax on all imported steel and aluminum could give a helping hand to domestic steel and aluminum makers, but raise costs for businesses and consumers...

item.title: Police unplug Ed Sheeran's impromptu busking performance in Bengaluru
item.description: British superstar singer Ed Sheeran, after being unplugged by Indian police, insists he did have permission to busk in tech hub Bengaluru.

item.title: What are tariffs and why is Trump using them?
item.description: The cost of cars, fruit and pharmaceuticals could increase because of Trump's tariff announcement.

item.title: Third federal judge blocks Trump's birthright citizenship executive order
item.description: U.S. District Judge Joseph Laplante agreed to grant a preliminary injunction sought by immigrant-rights groups.

item.title: Palestinian refugees in Syria have a message for Gazans: Don't leave your land

item.title: How to avoid surveillance pricing scams that target you based on your data
item.description: A new investigation from the Federal Trade Commission reveals that companies may be using your data against you. Surveillance pricing is when a compan...

item.title: Macron shares his deepfakes for AI summit attention
item.description: The French president posted a montage of parodies featuring himself to promote an AI Summit in Paris.

item.title: What to know about the Salman Rushdie stabbing trial
item.description: A 27-year-old man faces a jury trial in New York state, where Mr Rushdie is expected to testify.

item.description: A junior partner in South Africa's governing coalition calls the new Expropriation Act unconstitutional.

item.title: Romania President resigns after impeachment pressure over cancelled vote
item.description: His exit comes as political opponents had sought to remove him over remaining in office beyond the end of his term.
